alert.note: Alert for Duval (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 2:11AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duval County through 300 AM CDT... At 211 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Benavides, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rosita. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
